title: hanten_(clothes)
body:
A traditional Japanese jacket/half coat. What's referred to as a hanten these days is a "wataire (stuffed) hanten" which is stuffed with cotton, mostly worn inside to protect yourself from the cold. It is worn by both men and women.
A dotera, also known as a tanzen, is a long, gown style winter garment with a low hemline, but it is often mixed up with a hanten.

A type of unstuffed jacket, that was called a shirushi-banten (印半纏, "hanten with an emblem"), is effectively the same as what is usually called a [[happi]] in the present day. There are small stylistic differences, but these were lost for the most part in the late Edo period.

h4.See also

* "Wikipedia article":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hanten]

* [[dotera (clothes)]]

title: akashi_school_uniform_company
body:
Akashi School Uniform Company (sometimes shortened to Akashi S.U.C.) is a Japanese company that manufactures and sells school uniforms.


h4. Promotional Characters

On November 18, 2015, Akashi SUC announced a promotional campaign based around characters designed by [[Misaki Kurehito]].
The 3D models of the characters were created by ISAO and programmed by MasatakaP (まさたかP). 
Music and lyrics were done by buzzG.


h6. Characters
* [[Fujisaka Shion]]
* [[Hokaze Aoi]]
* [[Kagura Komachi]]

h6. Links
* "Official site":http://www.pri-sta.jp
* Video: "PRキャラクター発表会　明石S.U.C.　手話で会社紹介":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CYCcTgNHQzk   (PR Character Presentation - Company Profile in Sign Language)
** Hokaze Aoi talks about Akashi S.U.C.  She uses sign language and the video also includes subtitles.
* Video: "明石S.U.C PRキャラクター発表会 Japanese school uniform company 'Akashi S.U.C' PV":[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8GRN3WyX_8o]
** A 30 second clip of Hokaze Aoi singing.
* Video: "KSBスーパーJチャンネル PRキャラクター発表会　明石S.U.C. in秋葉原UDX":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Uh6ipi4A-k (KSB Super J Channel PR Character Presentation - Akashi S.U.C. in Akihabara UDX)
** A short segment talking about and showing the promotional characters.  Includes an interview with [[Kanemoto Hisako]], the seiyuu for Hokaze Aoi. 



h4. Links

* "Official company page":http://www.akashi-suc.jp/
* "Wikipedia entry (Japanese)":https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明石被服興業

title: hachijou_ikuko
body:
[b]Major spoilers below.[/b]

Character from [[Umineko no Naku Koro ni]].

A reclusive writer, and lover, of mystery novels. She may or may not be a projected version of [[Featherine Augustus Aurora]].

[spoiler]Ikuko finds an amnesiac [[Ushiromiya Battler|Battler Ushiromiya]] on the side of the road, following the murders on Rokkenjima. She renames him [[Hachijou Tooya|Tohya Hachijo]], due to him only remembering the fact that he was 18 years old upon being discovered. After learning about [[yasu_(umineko)|Sayo Yasuda]]'s forgeries, she ghost wrote novels based on Tooya's attempts to remember the Rokkenjima murders. These novels then became the framing device for Episodes 3 through 6.[/spoiler]

title: peony_(flower)
body:
Long used as an ornamental and medicinal plant, the peony has large, showy flowers, often scented. The plant itself comes in herbaceous, treelike, and hybrid forms. It is named after Paeon, a student of Asclepius, the Greek god of medicine and healing.

h4. See also

* Wikipedia: "Peony":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peony

title: kotonomiya_yuki
body:
Character from the adult visual novel [[Suigetsu]]. Like castmate [[Yamato Suzuran]], she's a fan favorite of [[Futaba Channel]]'s Nijiura board.
 
Several derivative characters exist based on her. The most common are: 

* [[Yuki-san]] - Looks like the actual Yuki, but is almost always portrayed laughing maniacally.
* [[Yami Yuki]] - Dark Yuki. Has no hair ribbons or neckerchief. Sometimes seen in black/purple outfit.
* [[Chibi Yami]] - Small, most commonly seen with a long black cat creature.
* [[Kiri-san]] - Long hair, glasses, red hair ribbons.
* [[Yukiko-san]] - Short hair, glasses, green hair ribbons.

title: brain_drain_(skullgirls)
body:
Lab 7's only successful psychic experiment, most of Brain Drain's body was destroyed in the disaster which consumed the facility. The experience left him doubtful of human reliability, so as far as he is concerned anybody who falls short of his expectations is to be replaced. Because of this ruthless approach, he soon became the widely-feared second-in-command of Lab 0. An expert at analyzing others, he even believes he can construct superior mechanical replicas.

title: money_gesture
body:
A Japanese hand gesture that indicates money.  It is similar to the [[OK sign]] with the thumb and index finger forming a loop, the shape of a coin.  

While the money sign can be done in the same manner as the [[OK sign]], for tagging purposes this tag should be used where the palm is horizontal as opposed to vertical and/or the looped thumb and finger are toward the viewer as opposed to toward the person performing the gesture.

body:
Feldt Grace is a character in [[Gundam 00]] who is a Tactical Operator and mechanic onboard Ptolemy of Celestial Being. She is the daughter of [[Ruido Resonance]] and [[Marlene Vlady]]. 

In season 1, despite her age, Feldt was noticeable as being a fully developed attractive 14 year old dressed up in a skintight outfit that appears reminiscent of an old school female Super Robot pilot.

title: oshiromi_reshino
body:
"Mrs. Estacion"

The Final Boss of [[Mrs. Estacion]], and its titular antagonist. He is one of the few beings capable of returning [[himeka (estacion)|Himeka]] from the dream world, but he initially refuses to help her, as she struck down his subordinates. Initially, he seeks to turn her into another one of his Mrs. as revenge.

Estacion is the Spanish word for "season", fitting the boss titles being named after seasons. Despite appearances, he is actually male, and despite being male, his title is still "[[Mrs. Estacion]]", sticking with the pattern of having each of the boss titles start with "Mrs."

He wields Cupid's Bow, which is capable of enthralling others into his service. This is how he was able to turn the other Mrs. into his underlings, and how he plans to turn Himeka into yet another.

title: ipo-chan
body:
Ipo-chan is the [[personification|gijinka]] of the Indonesian filtering service [[Internet Positif]]. She usually wears a [[blue shirt]], a [[red skirt]], [[headphones]], and [[glasses]] to represent her position as a strict filter. She also wears an [[armband]] around her right arm, which has a [[plus sign]], the symbol of Internet Positif.

Her [[red eyes]] also have the [[symbol-shaped pupils|plus sign]], as does her hairclip which holds her [[black hair|black haired]] [[side ponytail]]. The girl is portrayed as "authoritative yet bullyable".

The concept of IPO-chan originated from "this Facebook page post":[https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=852285721516589&id=575945599150604].

title: oscar_(naval_flag)
body:
Maritime signal flag 'Oscar'.

Singular: "Man overboard."

(often attached to the man overboard pole on boats).
With a sinister hoist, the semaphore flag.

Identified as a square with a diagonal split between red on the top and yellow on the bottom.

When paired with Romeo and Uniform, it becomes the IJNAS signal 'R-O-U', which means, "I am going to steam into the wind for launch operations."

title: romeo_(naval_flag)
body:
Maritime signal flag 'Romeo'.

Unusual for an ICS flag, Romeo has no singular meaning. Stands in for the letter 'R'.

Distance (range) in nautical miles.


Identified as a red square with a yellow cross in the diagonal.


When paired with Oscar and Uniform, it becomes the IJNAS signal 'R-O-U', which means 'I am going to steam into the wind for launch operations'.

title: uniform_(naval_flag)
body:
Maritime signal flag 'Uniform'.

Singular: "You are running into danger." In word or code, Uniform stands in for the letter 'U'.

Identified as a red-white four-square checker, with red being in the top left.

Uniform is very similar to the Polish Air Force roundel, please do not confuse the two.

When paired with Romeo and Oscar, becomes the IJNAS signal 'R-O-U', which means "I am going to steam into the wind for launch operations."

title: amaki_teishan
body:
"Mrs. Winter"

The Extra Stage Boss of [[Mrs. Estacion]], and the only girl powerful enough to resist [[Oshiromi Reshino]]'s Cupid Bow. She is the one who summoned [[himeka (estacion)|Himeka]] into the dreamworld, and she will continue to do so until she is defeated.

Her theme music was used in [[Kawashiro Nitori]]'s fan-made Post-EX stage for [[Mountain of Faith]].

title: hakutaku_yumemi
body:
"Mrs. Fall"

The Stage-Three Boss of [[Mrs. Estacion]]. She initially confronts and refuses to help [[himeka (estacion)|Himeka]] awake from her dream due to her aggression towards [[Tanabata Furin]] and [[Kabuki Mujina]]. Himeka justifies her actions by saying it's okay since it's a dream, angering Yumemi further.

Fans of [[Mrs. Estacion]] aren't sure what species Yumemi is, but it is speculated that she is a dog.

title: tanabata_furin
body:
"Mrs. Summer"

The Stage-two Boss of [[Mrs. Estacion]]. "Furin" is the word for "[[wind chime]]," an object which she carries with her, and her family name refers to the yearly [[Tanabata]] festival held from July to August.

title: kabuki_mujina
body:
"Mrs. Spring"

The Stage-one Boss of [[Mrs. Estacion]]. As a Mujina, she is a shape-shifting badger, somewhat similar to a [[tanuki]], and while her ingame sprite has a tail, her artwork does not.

title: let's_go_fishin'
body:
A tabletop game that uses a rotating upper plate with holes in it for several plastic fish to mimic fishing.  As the plate rotates it will move the plastic fish over protruding rails that lay below it. This will occasionally raise the plastic fish allowing them to open their mouths.  A player using a toy fishing rod attempts to get the toy hook of the fishing rod into their mouths to catch the fish.  The older versions of this game required having to then wait for the fish to descend and close their mouths on the hook, while newer versions use a magnet and so can lift the fish out as soon as its in their mouth.

US Patent #4,936,574. Filed September 21, 1988, by Ching H. Lee.

title: doctor_k_shoujo
body:
A novel series by Rezarena (レザレナ).
The main character is a girl Hidaka Ayumi (日高亜弓) who plays pitcher in baseball.


h4. Setting
From http://ncode.syosetu.com/n3083bm/
[quote]【秋大会編スタート！】主人公の日高亜弓は良い投手として期待されていたが、とある事件がきっかけで全力投球が出来なくなった。そのまま中学を卒業すると強豪として知られる松江学園に入学する。しかし亜弓は「選手じゃなくてマネージャーでもいい。」と考えてた。そこに同じクラスメイトの羽葉由紀という凄腕のソフトボール選手に出会う。今まで心に傷を負っていた亜弓がふたたび選手としての道を歩もうとしていた…[/quote]


h4. syosetu.com
The novel is available on syosetu.com.  Aside from the main story, Rezarena has also published a few side stories.

title: fu-girl
body:
A character in [[Denki-gai no Hon'ya-san]]. A short girl with [[orange hair]]; has a restrained version of [[sharp teeth]]. While her nickname at first seems to be a reference to [[fujoshi]], the 腐 (fu, "rotten") part actually refers to her obsession with [[zombie|zombies]].

Judging by the information on that school swimsuit she wears during Denki-gai Festival, of which she claims to be one of her actual clothing instead of some kind of cosplay, her last name is apparently "谷津(Yatsu)".

title: grancrest
body:
A Japanese fantasy tabletop RPG. 
It is set in the world of Atratan, a land of magic, warring nations, and fantastical creatures such as unicorns and dragons. There is also Chaos, "an inexplicable energy which can be thought of possibility. These possibilities become manifest in the real world through either natural or artificial means (called a "Chaos Convergence"). When Chaos converges, it causes the collapse of the order that had been operating up until that point."

The setting was designed by Mizuno Ryo (水野良), the creator of [[Record of Lodoss War]], Legend of Crystania, Rune Soldier Louie, [[Sword World]], and more.

h4. Light Novels
There are several "GranCrest Replay" light novel series.

* [[Grancrest Replay: Faldoria Senrouki]]

h4. Links

* "Official page":http://grancrest.jp/

title: monkey_turn
body:
Monkey Turn (モンキーターン) is a shōnen manga by Katsutoshi Kawai. The manga was serialized in Shōnen Sunday. The manga spawned two anime series, "Monkey Turn" and "Monkey Turn V". The series won the Shogakukan Manga Award in the shōnen category in 2000.

The series follows Kenji Hatano, a young man who sets out to master conquer the world of kyōtei (hydroplane racing). Over the course of the series he develops a serious rivalry with fellow racer Hiro Doguchi.

title: maou_koroshi_no_ryuukishi
body:
"The Devil King Killing Dragon Knight"
A light novel series with story by 鷹山誠一 and illustrations by [[ran'ou (tamago no kimi)]]. 
The author has been posting the story on syosetu.com since at least February 2015. The first book was printed in October 2015.


h4. Backstory
From http://www.amazon.co.jp/魔王殺しの竜騎士1-鷹山-誠一/dp/4798611026

[quote]
内容紹介

著者は「百錬の覇王と聖約の戦乙女」の鷹山誠一先生
「小説家になろう」で話題をさらった、大人気異世界ファンタジー!


人類と魔族が雌雄を決した戦いで魔王を倒したものの、闇に飲まれてしまった勇者ランスロット。気づくとそこは、38年後の世界だった。平和になった世の中でランスロットは、勇者であることを隠し、二度目の人生を満喫し始める??
魔王さえ倒した最強の竜騎士が、刻を超え、新たな戦場(フィールド)で無双する!! 大人気の最強系ドラゴンファンタジー!
[/quote]


h4. Links

* "On syosetu.com":http://ncode.syosetu.com/n0141co/

title: minotaurus_no_sara
body:
ミノタウロスの皿 (ミノタウロスのさら, "Minotaurus's Plate" / "Plate Of The Minotaur")

A short [[science fiction]] story manga written & illustrated by "Fujiko F. Fujio":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fujiko_Fujio#Fujiko_Fujio_.28Fujiko_F._Fujio_and_Fujiko_Fujio_A.29.27s_Works in 1969. It was adapted into an OVA in July, 1990.
It was his first work of "”[i]Fujiko F. Fujio's Sci-Fi Short Stories” (藤子・F・不二雄のSF短編)[/i]":http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E8%97%A4%E5%AD%90%E3%83%BBF%E3%83%BB%E4%B8%8D%E4%BA%8C%E9%9B%84%E3%81%AESF%E7%9F%AD%E7%B7%A8. 

h4.Characters

* Nameless astronaut (manga) / [[Astronaut Tachibana]] (Anime)
* [[Minoa]] - A girl of Inoxian "Usu", the name of human-shaped livestock race on planet Inox
* [[Zun-Rui]] (Cow men) - The primary lifeforms on the planet

h4.See also

* Wikipedia artcle (JP): "ミノタウロスの皿":http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%83%9F%E3%83%8E%E3%82%BF%E3%82%A6%E3%83%AD%E3%82%B9%E3%81%AE%E7%9A%BF 
* My Anime List: "Minotaurus's Plate (Manga)":http://myanimelist.net/manga/16566/Minotauruss_Plate 
* Blog entries about this story: " TSOTE's blog":http://threestepsoverjapan.blogspot.jp/2012/01/review-minotaurs-plate.html

title: elraia_serumika_(ika_sen)
body:
A character in an original creation by [[Ika_Sen]] that is currently untitled.
She has [[blue hair]].

h4. Profile
From http://ikasenbei.web.fc2.com/original/1/raia.html

[quote]
●名前：エルライア・セルミカ
●愛称：ライア
●性別：女
●年齢：17歳
●種族：人間(混血)
●身長：150cm
●一人称：あたし
●武器：チェーンソー
●利き手：右手
●好きな食べ物：冷たいもの
●嫌いな食べ物：味が濃いもの
●性格：冷静、常識人


武器屋の娘。鍛冶師の祖父と2人暮らし。
幼少時に両親が離婚後、母親が病死したため、祖父に引き取られた。
隣人のルイとは生まれた当時から付き合いがある。後にルイと結婚する。
[/quote]

title: rui_riveruaaku_(ika_sen)
body:
(No clear romanization for his last name.)

A character in an original creation by [[Ika_Sen]] that is currently untitled.
He has hair that appears either [[green hair|green]] or [[brown hair|brown]].

h4. Profile
From http://ikasenbei.web.fc2.com/original/1/rui.html

[quote]
●名前：ルイ・リヴェルアーク
●性別：男
●年齢：17歳
●種族：人間(混血)
●身長：172cm
●一人称：僕
●武器：ダガー
●利き手：右手
●好きな食べ物：義母の手料理
●嫌いな食べ物：なし
●性格：元気


港町に住む少年。血の繋がっていない両親との3人家族。父親は単身赴任している。
ライア、グリオン、エイメルとは幼馴染み。
一見穏やかに見えるが、度胸は据わっており好奇心旺盛。
いろんなことに首を突っ込んではトラブルを起こし、隣人のライアを悩ませている様子。
護身用に2本のダガーを所持しているものの、扱いは素人。
生き別れの双子の弟がいるが、本人はそのことを知らない。
後にライアと結婚する。

[/quote]

title: kooriyama_ori_(ika_sen)
body:
A character in the original creation that's under the working name 勇者創作 by [[Ika_Sen]].
She has [[short hair]] that's either [[brown hair|brown]] or [[red hair|red]].

h4. Profile
From http://ikasenbei.web.fc2.com/original/3/ori.html

[quote]
●名前：郡山 織(こおりやま おり)
●性別：女
●年齢：15歳
●誕生日：5月24日
●種族：人間
●身長：155cm
●血液型：o型
●一人称：あたし
●武器：箒
●耐性属性：光
●性格：天然


異世界プレロラに飛ばされた中学3年生。
丸腰で魔物に襲われそうになったところをミナモに助けられ、出会った。
後にマキナ、シノも加わって4人で魔王を倒すことになる。

物心つく前に両親を亡くしており、叔父夫婦の元で暮らしていた。兄のような存在の従兄弟がいる。
パーティメンバーである3人とはいずれも現実世界では面識がなかった。
カンナとは同級生。

プレロラでは魔法を使って戦っているものの、異様に失敗する。
胸元の猫のぬいぐるみの名前は「トム」。 
[/quote]

title: minazuki_minamo_(ika_sen)
body:
A character in the original creation that's under the working name 勇者創作 by [[Ika_Sen]].
He has [[orange hair]].

h4. Profile
From  http://ikasenbei.web.fc2.com/original/3/minamo.html

[quote]
●名前：水無月ミナモ(みなづき みなも)
●性別：男
●年齢：15歳
●種族：人間
●身長：162cm
●血液型：AB型
●一人称：俺
●武器：片手剣
●耐性属性：光、氷
●性格：無感情


異世界プレロラに飛ばされた中学3年生。深川ほなみの息子であり、マヒロの弟。
王国から勇者の素質があると言われ、オリ、マキナ、シノとパーティを組み魔王を倒すことになった。
勇者の証である頭飾りを身に付けている。

異常なほどに感情に乏しく、常に無表情である。 彼が笑ったところを見た者はいない。
怠け癖が激しく、何に対してもやる気を発揮しない。 魔王討伐にも乗り気でないが、元の世界に戻るために渋々協力する。

現実世界ではゲームオタクだった。マキナとは同級生。
[/quote]

title: asagiri_duberry_(ika_sen)
body:
A character in the original creation [[Asagiri Family]] by [[Ika_Sen]].
She has [[long hair|long]] [[red hair]].

h4. Profile
From http://ikasenbei.web.fc2.com/original/2/asagi.html

[quote]
●名前：アサギリ・デュベリー
●愛称：アサギ
●性別：女
●年齢：16歳
●種族：人間
●身長：160cm
●一人称：あたし
●利き手：右手
●性格：元気、無鉄砲、夢見がち


ある港町のアパートで一人暮らしを始めた少女。
事故で両親を亡くし、大手玩具メーカーを営む親戚に養子として引き取られ生活していた。
唯一の健在の家族は祖母だが、行方不明。
時折ふらりと現れる祖母と遊ぶのが何よりの楽しみだった。

貴族の血に縛られ息苦しい生活を送っていた反動か、自由に外の地で暮らすことを夢見ていた。
また、年齢に合わず魔法や異世界などの非現実的な要素に憧れを抱いており、ジノからは夢見がちと呆れられている。
夢見がちなお嬢様である感覚の違いから、町では溶け込めずにいる。


【経緯】
祖母に譲り受けたアパートで暮らすべく訪れたものの、そこは誰も住んでいない空き家だった。
鍵を使うと、なんとそれぞれの部屋が異世界に繋がっていた。
神界、魔界、おもちゃの国…アサギは、様々な世界の種族をアパートの住人に引き入れようと考え異世界に踏み込む。
一方で、町にうまく馴染めないことに対する現実逃避となっている。
[/quote]

title: jino_valentine_(ika_sen)
body:
A character in the original creation [[Asagiri Family]] by [[Ika_Sen]].
He has [[brown hair]].

h4. Profile
From http://ikasenbei.web.fc2.com/original/2/jino.html

[quote]
●名前：ジノ・ヴァレンタイン
●性別：男
●年齢：16歳
●誕生日：2月14日
●種族：人間
●身長：165cm
●一人称：俺
●利き手：左手
●性格：真面目、無愛想


田舎町の「ヴァレンタインハウス」という孤児院出身の少年。 孤児院の子供達と家族のように育った。
アサギがアパートで一人暮らしを始めたのと同時期に、玩具店で見習いとして働くために港町にやってきた。
住む当てがなかったためアサギのアパートで住むことになる。

手工品を愛しており、手先を使った細かい作業を得意とする。特に彫刻や木製の玩具作りが得意。
孤児院にいた頃からよく玩具を手作りしては子供達を喜ばせていた。
将来は子供に夢を与える玩具職人になるのが夢。

しかし、経済的に苦しい生活が続いており、港町に来てからは早く一人前になるために焦る気持ちが速まっている様子。
それに反し、豊かに暮らす貴族出身のアサギに対してもどかしさを感じ、理想と現実の板挟みになる。


ぶっきらぼうで言葉遣いが荒く、言葉に皮肉を感じるが、根は至って真面目。
人間関係に関しては淡白に見えがちだが、故郷の家族に対する愛情は人一倍大きい。
自分と正反対の環境で育ち、努力や苦労を知らないアサギには常に苛立ちが絶えない。
アサギの夢見がちな理想を現実逃避だと非難する。

アパートではアサギの隣の部屋を借りている。
個性的な住人のマイペースさにいつも振り回されている様子。
よくベッドに潜り込んでくるミトに悩まされている。
[/quote]

title: mito_(ika_sen)
body:
A character in the original creation [[Asagiri Family]] by [[Ika_Sen]].
He is a zombie.

h4. Profile
From http://ikasenbei.web.fc2.com/original/2/mito.html

[quote]
●名前：ミト
●性別：男
●年齢：5歳
●種族：ゾンビ
●身長：107cm
●一人称：僕
●性格：呑気


魔界で魔王に仕えるゾンビ。元々は人間だった。
人間が死亡してゾンビとなった者は、魔界にて魔王に奉仕する決まりがあり、一定期間仕えると来世は人間に生まれ変わることができる。
しかし、ミトは生まれて間もなく死亡し、人間としての記憶が全くないため、
人間に生まれ変わることには興味がなく、仕事に対しても不真面目だった。

幼いながらも強かで、魔界に関しては博識。
それに反して人間の心情については非常にうとく、空気を読まない発言が多い。
ソナとは気が合うようで、よく一緒に悪戯をしては怒られる。

ゾンビだけに死臭がひどく、アパートの住人にも入浴を強く勧められるが、
本人曰く「体を洗うと大変なことになる」らしく、風呂に入るのを嫌がっている。
アパートでは自室を持っていない。夜によくジノのベッドに潜り込んでは嫌がられてる。


【経緯】
魔界で魔王に仕えていたが、異世界からやってきたアサギに出会い、人間にも興味を持つようになる。
次第に生まれ変わるために真面目に働くことを考えるが、
まずは人間のことを詳しく勉強するために、魔界を抜け出してアサギのアパートに住み着いた。 
[/quote]

title: ichi_(ika_sen)
body:
Character in original [[Numbers Lab]] by [[Ika_Sen]].

h4. Profile
From http://ikasenbei.web.fc2.com/original/5/ichi.html

[quote]
●名前：イチ
●本名：不明
●性別：女
●年齢：不明(見た目は11～12歳)
●種族：人間
●身長：130cm
●一人称：イチ
●性格：気まぐれ、面倒くさがり


動物解剖学を専攻する研究者。
感情の起伏に乏しく、年齢の割に冷めている。独特な喋り方をする。
解剖が大好きで、動物の死体を拾って来ては解剖している。
その変わった性癖からか、町の住人からは嫌われている。
しかし、周りから敬遠されている理由が他にあるらしい。
自身も人間嫌いを自称しており、人に会うことを嫌がっている。

ある日、魔界の生物をペットにしたいと考え、ゼロを召喚した。
人の姿をしているにも関わらず、ゼロを完全にペット扱いしている。
魔力を封じているのをいいことに、紐で繋いだり、観察日記をつけたり、解剖しようとしたりと好き勝手に扱っている。


また、興味を持った生物には名前(番号)をつけて自分の研究所で共に暮らしている。
ゼロを始めニイ、サン、シー、ゴウがそうだが、いずれにも人間はいない。
「イチ」も本名ではなく愛称である。

生活面に関して非常にだらしがなく、ゼロやニイの手を焼いている。
好き嫌いが激しく、特ににんじんが大嫌い。出不精で、風呂には3日に1度しか入らない。
週に1度、買い出しと、所属している研究所に顔を出しに渋々出かける。

幼いながらも正規の研究員であったり、詳しい年齢や本名を明かそうとしなかったり、魔界の存在を知っていたりと謎が多い。
好きな言葉は「百聞は一解剖にしかず」。
[/quote]

title: zero_(ika_sen)
body:
Character in original [[Numbers Lab]] by [[Ika_Sen]].

h4. Profile
From http://ikasenbei.web.fc2.com/original/5/zero.html
[quote]
●名前：ゼロ
●本名：不明
●性別：男
●年齢：約180歳(人間年齢18歳)
●種族：悪魔
●身長：180cm
●一人称：俺
●性格：真面目


魔界に住んでいた悪魔。孤児。
人間(魔族)関係に恵まれず、天涯孤独に過ごしていた。
強力な魔力を持っているため、魔界では周りに恐れられていた。

ある日、人間が住む世界に召喚され、イチにペットにされてしまう。
更に不思議な首輪をつけられたことで魔法を封じられ、無力となってしまった。
本名を名乗る前にイチに「ゼロ」と勝手に名付けられる。
魔界に帰る術もなく人間界で生活し始めるが、わがままで不摂生の目立つ変人イチを始め、個性的な住人達に日々振り回されている。

周りからは恐れられていたが、実は誠実で優しい性格。
器用で面倒見がよい。家事が大の得意。
料理や掃除などを全て機械に任せていたのが気に入らず、イチとニイの代わりに家事をこなす。

研究所でペットとして嫌々過ごしていたはずが、次第に魔界に帰るという目的を忘れ、イチに手を焼いている。
孤独だった影響か、人と接することに喜びを感じ始めている。
好きな言葉は「丸い部屋を四角く掃く」。



【経歴】
誕生直後に捨てられる
↓
魔族に拾われ育てられる(幼少期)
↓
育ててもらっていたはずの魔族に人身売買に掛けられそうになる。返り討ちにする(幼少期)
↓
スラム街で生活する
↓
人間界に召喚される
イチに魔力を封じられ、ペットとして同居させられる(180歳くらい)
[/quote]

title: educational_broadcasting_system
body:
"Educational Broadcasting System (한국교육방송공사) or EBS is the only educational television and radio network covering South Korean territory, and the only major South Korean radio and television network without a separate regional service. Established as KBS 3TV in the 1980s, and became an independent corporation in 1990. EBS strives to supplement school education and promote lifelong education for everyone in Korea. The main counterparts of this network are PBS, as well as BBC Two and BBC Four in the UK." [1]

title: baby_steps
body:
"Baby Steps is a Japanese manga series by Hikaru Katsuki. It has been serialized in Kodansha's Weekly Shōnen Magazine since October 2007. The story is centered on Eiichirō Maruo, a first year honor student who one day decides that he is lacking exercise. He then joins the Southern Tennis Club (STC) where he begins his tennis journey. An anime television series adaptation of the series began airing in Japan in April 2014 with a second season began airing April 5, 2015. It also won the 38th Kodansha Manga Award in the Best Shōnen Manga category." [1]

title: tadakuni
body:
Character from [i][[Danshi Koukousei no Nichijou]][/i].

A student in Sanada North Boys High who acts as the straight man (or "Double Act") of the group. He is usually involved in Hidenori and Yoshitake's wild ideas despite his disapproval. He has a younger sister whom he hardly talks to, but is stronger than him and his friends. He also works part-time at a pizza restaurant. Despite being introduced like a main protagonist, he gets the least roles in the trio. Gradually, he loses screen time and fades into the background, appearing even less than supporting characters.

title: left_shark
body:
"The Left Shark, also known as the Super Bowl Halftime Shark, is a nickname given to one of the stage dancers dressed in a shark costume during Katy Perry’s halftime performance at the Super Bowl XLIX on February 1st, 2015." [1]

At one point, there were two backup dancers dressed in shark costumes, to the left and right of Perry. While the shark on the right seemed to be following the routine correctly, the one on the left appeared to be moving clumsily. 

Left Shark's performance went viral on the internet. Perry's performance was nominated for an Emmy and she tweeted a picture of herself in a shark costume, thanking Left Shark.[2]

Perry has attempted to trademark the Left Shark design.


h4. Links

* [1] http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/super-bowl-xlix-halftime-shark
* [2] https://twitter.com/katyperry/status/621758074827743232

title: number_pun
body:
A system where numbers are used to spell out Japanese words. It is similar to things like the use of 2 for [i]to[/i] in English, but more complex.

Numbers may be read as native Japanese (kun'yomi), Sino-Japanese (on'yomi), or as English, and are usually shortened to the first kana. They can also be read as though they had dakuten (゛) or handakuten (゜) added to them if necessary. E.g. the number 8 can be [i]ya[/i] (short for yattsu), [i]ha[/i] (short for hachi), [i]ba[/i] (ha with dakuten) or [i]pa[/i] (ha with handakuten).

h4. See also

* [[date pun]]

title: elfnein
body:
CV [[Kuno Misaki]]

Elfnein, a character who offers aid to the protagonists to be able to fight and stop [[Carol Malus Dienheim]].  She is a homunculus created by Carol and appears as a young girl who looks similar to Carol.  She actually has no real gender though, as she lacks genitals.

[spoiler]By the end of the third season, while being on the verge of death she merges into the body of [[Carol Malus Dienheim]] who at the time is also dying due to damage to her mind. Because Carols mind was almost gone her merged form is predominantly Elfnein. The new Elfnein has carols hair colour (light blonde) rather than Elfneins (greenish blonde) and presumably has genitals.[/spoiler]

title: zwei_worter
body:
A japanese H-game with following story:

In 2005, a group of meteors deals a big blow to humanity. But thanks to advanced science and technology, mankind overcomes extinction by creating new intellectual living creatures called "Dissolve".

In 2007, incredibly powerfull outerspace creatures called Elcid launch their onslaught against earth. Extinction is only avoided because of the advances made in the recovery of the previous disaster. But in the end, in just two years
nine-tenth of the population loses their lives.

In 2017, last surviving members of the human race, "Dissolve" and an another new race intellectual living creatures called "Hybrid" all band up together for their final stand against Elcid....

title: plastic_memories
body:
A 2015 anime series by Doga Kôbô.

h6.Plot

Giftias, androids possessing a humanlike appeareance and emotions, are available as companions, but they have an expiration date. Meet Tsukasa Mizugaki, a new employee at SAI Corp. He gets paired up with Isla, a childlike female giftia to recover others close to their expiration dates. He falls in love with her, as many others do with their artificial partners and letting go is never easy.

h4.See also

* "Wikipedia article":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Plastic_Memories

title: acala
body:
([[Sanskrit]]: Acala, [i]Achala[/i] अचल; "immovable" one)

A guardian deity (vidyaraja) in esoteric [[Buddhism]] (Vajrayana). He is popular in Japanese Buddhist traditions, where he is called Fudou Myouou (不動明王). His properties are Although the properly esoteric Shingon sect claims particular reverence of him, he is received even in largely exoteric traditions such as Nichiren, Tendai Lotus and Zen, as well as the Japanese syncretic tradition of Shugendou. 

Not to be confused with [[Fudou Akio]], a character from the Inazuma Eleven series, whose name is a different reading of the same characters. 

h4. Links

* http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Acala
* http://www.aisf.or.jp/~jaanus/deta/f/fudoumyouou.htm
* http://www.onmarkproductions.com/html/fudo.html

In "the book":[http://www.fukuinkan.co.jp/bookdetail.php?goods_id=322], nanny goat [[Dhon Cholecha]] has two heads for some reason - an ordinary goat's head and a fox's head.

title: ice_cream_egg
body: Referred to by names such as [i]Tamago Aisu[/i] (たまごアイス) or [i]Oppai Aisu[/i] (おっぱいアイス), it is ice cream frozen in a balloon-like container.  The container is supposed to be somewhat egg shaped, but unfortunately the shape is more similar to a condom's and has a small reservoir tip opposite of the sealed opening. The tip  is supposed to be where you cut open the container to eat the ice cream inside.  Alternatively some of these are reminiscent of a breast in shape instead, thus the other name [i]Oppai Aisu[/i] for the same product.

title: entwicklung_75
body: The Panzerkampfwagen E-75 was one of the [[tank]]s in the German [i]Entwicklung[/i] ("development") series, a World War II engineering project aimed at simplifying and standardizing all German armored fighting vehicles to streamline production.  The E-75 would have been the standard heavy tank in this series, replacing existing heavy tanks like the Tiger B.  The effort came too late in the war to be useful, and the E-series tanks never saw production, but the E-75 found new life - as it were - as a popular heavy tank in the online multiplayer battle game [i]World of Tanks[/i].

title: manzai
body: A form of Japanese comedy involving two people, a [i]Boke[/i] (funny man) and a [i]Tsukkomi[/i] (straight man), trading rapid-fire jokes. The [i]boke[/i] often mispronounces words or forgets what to say, while the [i]tsukkomi[/i] often sets their partner straight with a hit to the head (a [[harisen]] is common for this). This form of comedy is often done in the Kansai dialect.

title: palace_of_fine_arts
body:
"The Palace of Fine Arts in the Marina District of [[San Francisco]], California, is a monumental structure originally constructed for the 1915 Panama-Pacific Exposition in order to exhibit works of art presented there. One of only a few surviving structures from the Exposition, is still situated on its original site. It was rebuilt in 1965, and renovation of the lagoon, walkways, and a seismic retrofit were completed in early 2009." [1]

title: shirato_jiro
body:
Starting in 2007, [[SoftBank]] began a series of commericals that revolved around the "Shirato family":https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/白戸家 to advertise its "White Family plan":https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/ホワイトプラン. "Ueto Aya":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aya_Ueto and "Dante Carver":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dante_Carver play siblings and "Higuchi Kanako":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kanako_Higuchi plays the mother. The father, Shirato Jiro, is a talking dog played by Kai, a white "Hokkaido dog":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hokkaido_%28dog%29. Jiro is mostly called "Otousan" by his family, so on Pixiv, users tend to tag the appearance of the dog with the お父さん tag. 

The Shirato family commericals often have famous guest stars, who generally act as relatives of the family. For example, this "one":http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oOg3nBRp6A0 has Quentin Tarantino and this "one":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ImALuNp3PQ8 has Tommy Lee Jones.

h4. Links

* "Collection of these commercials (English subtitles)":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IJcvRLKO_pU 
* "Banana Phone (English subs)":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wcGuFUSh__0

title: a_bao_a_qu_(mythology)
body:
Á Bao A Qu is a legendary monster in the Tower of Victory in Chitor, described in "Jorge Luis Borges":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jorge_Luis_Borges]'s "Book of Imaginary Beings":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Book_of_Imaginary_Beings]. Actually, the true original source of the story is rather doubtful.

* For "an akuma/demon":http://megamitensei.wikia.com/wiki/A_Bao_A_Qu in [[Megami Tensei]] series, use [[A Bao A Qu (Megami Tensei)]].
* For Zeon's space fortress A Baoa Qu in [[Mobile Suit Gundam]] (and Titans' Gate of Zedan in [[Zeta Gundam]]), use [[A Baoa Qu]].

title: kisaragi_(floor_ni_maou_ga_imasu)
body:
Kisaragi is a character in [i][[Floor ni Maou ga Imasu]][/i].
She has [[short hair|short]] [[black hair]] with a [[hairclip]] and [[black eyes]].

h4. Profile

From http://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF02000018010000_68/
[quote]アモンに仕える魔族四天王のひとり。アモンを追ってやってきた。極度の人見知り。[/quote]
[quote]One of the four demonic kings that serves [[Amon Patricia|Amon]]. アモンを追ってやってきた。She is extremely shy.[/quote]
other_names: ダークナイト・キサラギ

title: floor_ni_maou_ga_imasu
body:
A manga with illustrations by [[Kawakami Masaki]] and story by Hato (はと). It's serialized in the monthly publication "Comic Alive" (コミックアライブ).

h4. Summary
From http://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF02000018010000_68/
[quote]ここはファミレス「ハミング・ダイニング」。まぁ、そこそこ繁盛はしている。俺は従業員の入間光一。今日はアルバイト志望の女の子が来ているのだが…。「我が名は魔王アモン・パトリシア。魔界を総べる者だ！」なぜか彼女は自分のことを魔王だと言ってきかなくて!? お腹が空くほど暴れまわる！ 新感覚まかないコメディ！ [/quote]

[quote]This is the family restaurant "Humming Dining". I guess it does pretty well. I'm an employee there, Iruma Kouichi. Today, a girl wanting a part-time job came, but... "I am the Devil King Amon Patricia. I rule over the demon world!" なぜか彼女は自分のことを魔王だと言ってきかなくて!? And when she gets hungry enough, she becomes violent! 新感覚まかないコメディ！ [/quote]


h4. Characters

* [[Amon Patricia]]
* [[Iruma Kouichi]]
* [[Igarashi Mutsu]] (五十嵐むつ)
* [[kisaragi (floor ni maou ga imasu)|Kisaragi]]
* Nonko ノンコ
other_names: フロアに魔王がいます

h4. Profile

From http://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF02000018010000_68/

title: digestion
body: The process of food breaking down food into nutrients inside the [[stomach]]. Beginning when the food is in the mouth, then ingested by swallowing down the throat (esophagus), entering the stomach. Digestion normally takes up to 3 or 4 hours to complete. And ends with the food being broken down in smaller bits in the intestines, allowing gases to accumulate along with excrement being passed out of the [[anus]].
